0.1.6.name: wordpress/buddypress-quickpress
0.1.6.description:
!WARNING : this plugin has been discontinued and replaced by One Click Post, for WP 3 and higher.

This plugin allows the users to write simple posts outside the dashboard (just like QuickPress from the Dashboard).

It adds a "Quickpress" submenu under /blog from which you can easily add a post to any of your blogs.

!This is an alpha release, please check "Known Bugs" at the end of this post.
